relation: I am in a sorority and i love Greek Life, it is one of the best decisions i have made in college, it is a great way to make new friends and get evolve with something with a cause.

The Clubs on campus are all run by students and almost all of them evolve some community service and being part of any of them is a great way to know Wesleyan and really know the students and community.
It is a private school, therefore it is not cheap, yet it is worth it.

I am a member of Bobcat Entertainment (BE) and we always have events that are fun for students on weekends and sometimes during the week. There is never a bored day if you know the right people and places to be.

Food and dinning needs an upgrade. It can be good sometimes in the dinning hall, but there's always Catz Claws and Sunny Bucks when it's not. Some student go to fast food restaurants outside of campus or sheetz.
If you have a choice to pick where your living, make sure you check the place out first. Get to know and like your roommate. It can be fun, if you respect yourself and others.
classes are not easy but if you apply yourself you will do just fine.
Get evolve on campus as much as you can. Don't get mix with the wrong crow. Try to remember your purpose pf coming to Wesleyan, and do not for get it.
Wesleyan is a great school. It is academically challenging. There's a lot to do on and off campus,if you apply yourself.

textBeforeTable: 12/27/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 1 of 28 Lyndsey from Clendenin, WV Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Bang for the buck Yes, Wesleyan is kind of pricy, but when you graduate from here, you will have a top notch education. And they do offer many academic scholarships. Am enjoying being here I LOVE Wesleyan! The campus is beautiful. The professors are nice and really care about their students. The dorms are okay. I am really enjoying the classes. And there are many groups with which to get involved with on campus. Am learning a lot I think that Wesleyan is a very good school based on academics. The professors here really want their students to learn and are willing to help in any way they can. They know each of their students by name and are concerned about you and how you are doing. I am learning a lot, and enjoying it too. Login to rate or flag the reviews David from Buckhannon, WV 10/30/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 of 28
